name: Malignance
passive: Haunt: Damaging an enemy champion with your Ultimate ability deals bonus magic damage and burns the ground beneath them for 4 seconds.
description: Item that provides Ability Power, Health, Ability Haste, Ability Haste. Passive effect: Damaging an enemy champion with your Ultimate ability deals bonus magic damage and burns the ground beneath them for 4 seconds.. Perfect for frontline champions who need to absorb damage.
tips: Provides excellent sustain in lane and during fights
The healing/lifesteal helps you stay in fights longer
Great for champions who take extended trades
Excellent for frontline champions who need to absorb damage
Build this when facing heavy mixed damage compositions
